body:
I know it may sound far fetched, but maybe we should use more values for request IDs ?
We now use ~2M (2^31) and 2M available request IDs aren't used just because of RDMA_IMM_DATA_ACK/MESSAGE.
Can we use (2^32 - 2) values with relative ease ?
